headline: Progress Software (PRGS) Launches Progress Federal Solutions Targeting U.S. Government Expansion
summary: Progress Software (PRGS) recently launched a new subsidiary, Progress Federal Solutions Inc., to support U.S. government digital transformation. Despite this expansion, the company's stock price saw a 3% decline last week, contrasting broader market gains. While broader market indicators showed an upward trend with technology stocks like Tesla and Alphabet leading the charge, Progress's decline suggests that recent expansions may not have provided immediate investor confidence.
